description: This is a comprehensive documentation of a day in the life of a large American metropolitan newspaper, the "Los Angeles Times". Included are roles of political and sports reporters, cartoonists, photographers, music critics, recipe testers. Advertising layouts, editing processes, proof reading. Computer techniques in type-setting and printing are also shown.
